content: crochet a double thick pot holder to protect your fingers and your counters as you work in the kitchen > the stained glass pot holder is the third pattern in the ** 2023 pot holders galore crochet along 1 ** with the purchase of an ebook you will receive all 12 +1 bonus pot holder patterns one pattern every month during the crochet-along in december you ll receive the final pot holder along with the bonus pattern this pattern includes written instructions step-by-step pictures and a video tutorial to help you > the free pattern for the stained glass pot holder can be found **here ** 2 > the complete video tutorial can be found ** here 3 ** > you can learn more about the pot holders galore crochet along ** here 4 ** skill level intermediate language english crochet terminology us terms crochet stitches chain slip_stitch double_crochet and front-post triple crochet size this pot holder measures 9 wide x 8 75 long when laid flat however instructions are provided to customize the size of your pot holder materials * 4 0mm crochet hook needed * 169 yds / 156 m of any medium 4 worsted weight cotton yarn in 4 colours 1 main and 3 contrasting colours * scissors * yarn needle * stitch marker or safety pin i hope you enjoy making your pot holders 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/pot-holders-galore-crochet-along-2023 2 https //thispixiecreates com/how-to-crochet-the-stained-glass-pot-holder-pgcal2023/ 3 https //youtu be/zcvtel1mqsm 4 https //thispixiecreates com/pot-holders-galore-crochet-along-2023-main-page/
